preference.name: TC_fts_use_shared_tmp_dir
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether the Autonomy server uses a network-shared folder as a temporary work directory.If the Teamcenter server and the Autonomy server are installed on different machines, this preference must be set to true. Valid Values: true - The Autonomy server uses a network-shared folder as a temporary work directory. false - Autonomy server does not use a network-shared folder as a temporary work directory.
